types:type.name: persona
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type persona = {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, identificador: String, nombre: String, apellido: String, sexo: String |} {"example": "{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"identificador\\\":\\\"123\\\",\\\"nombre\\\":\\\"Jhon\\\",\\\"apellido\\\":\\\"Doe\\\",\\\"sexo\\\":\\\"M\\\"}"}
